thread.title: Joe Scarborough: Trump’s ‘Losing His Sh*t’ with Media ‘Enemy’ Tweet
thread.title_full: Joe Scarborough: Trump’s ‘Losing His Sh*t’ with Media ‘Enemy’ Tweet

author: Josh Feldman
title: Joe Scarborough: Trump’s ‘Losing His Sh*t’ with Media ‘Enemy’ Tweet
text:
Joe Scarborough: Trump’s ‘Losing His Sh*t’ with Media ‘Enemy’ Tweet by Josh Feldman | 5:48 pm, February 17th, 2017 
MSNBC’s Joe Scarborough went off on President Trump late this afternoon after he tweeted out that “fake news” outlets like CNN and NBC are enemies of the American people . 
Echoing his Morning Joe co-host Mika Brzezinski , he tauntingly referred to Trump as a “fake president” and went on from there: Only a FAKE PRESIDENT would declare the First Amendment to be the enemy of the American people. https://t.co/ZFZvlTf8Az 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) February 17, 2017 It's not even Saturday morning and someone is already losing his shit. https://t.co/ZFZvlTf8Az 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) February 17, 2017 Someone is cranky that Gallup has him at 38% and Pew has him at 39%. So now he's resorting to FAKE TWEETS. SAD! https://t.co/ZFZvlTf8Az
